title: PL rising if more spending doesn't boost real GDP

content.question: If a large increase in total spending has no effect on real gross domestic product, it must be true that

choices.label: the economy is experiencing high unemployment
The spending multiplier is equal to 1
the economy is in short-run equilibrium

topic.text: 3.6: Changes in the AD-AS Model in the Short Run

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
